actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the minimum adjusted gross income limitation on medical expense deductions from 5 percent of adjusted gross income to 3 percent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the minimum adjusted gross income limitation on medical expense deductions from five percent to three percent of adjusted gross income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the minimum adjusted gross income limitation on medical expense deductions from 5 percent of adjusted gross income to 3 percent.
